params.taskDescription:
<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mrow>
      <mo>{</mo>
      <mtable columnalign="right center left" rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em">
        <mtr>
          <mtd>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mn>2</mn>
              <mi>x</mi>
              <mo>−<!-- − --></mo>
              <mn>6</mn>
              <mi>y</mi>
            </mrow>
          </mtd>
          <mtd>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mo>=</mo>
            </mrow>
          </mtd>
          <mtd>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mn>0</mn>
            </mrow>
          </mtd>
        </mtr>
        <mtr>
          <mtd>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mn>3</mn>
              <mi>x</mi>
              <mo>−<!-- − --></mo>
              <mn>4</mn>
              <mi>y</mi>
            </mrow>
          </mtd>
          <mtd>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mo>=</mo>
            </mrow>
          </mtd>
          <mtd>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mn>5</mn>
            </mrow>
          </mtd>
        </mtr>
      </mtable>
      <mo fence="true" stretchy="true" symmetric="true"></mo>
    </mrow>
  </mrow>
  <mspace width="1em"></mspace>
  <mspace width="1em"></mspace>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mtable columnalign="left" rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em">
      <mtr>
        <mtd>
          <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mtext>A: </mtext>
            <mo stretchy="false">(</mo>
            <mn>3</mn>
            <mo>,</mo>
            <mn>1</mn>
            <mo stretchy="false">)</mo>
          </mrow>
        </mtd>
      </mtr>
      <mtr>
        <mtd>
          <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mtext>B: </mtext>
            <mo stretchy="false">(</mo>
            <mo>−<!-- − --></mo>
            <mn>3</mn>
            <mo>,</mo>
            <mn>4</mn>
            <mo stretchy="false">)</mo>
          </mrow>
        </mtd>
      </mtr>
    </mtable>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">{\left\{ \begin{array}{*{20}{rcl}}{2x - 6y}&{ = }&{0}\\{3x - 4y}&{ = }&{5}\end{array}\right.}\quad\quad{\begin{array}{*{20}{l}}{\text{A: }(3,1)}\\ {\text{B: }( - 3,4)}\end{array}}</annotation></semantics></math>

<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mrow>
      <mo>{</mo>
      <mtable columnalign="right center left" rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em">
        <mtr>
          <mtd>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mo>−<!-- − --></mo>
              <mn>3</mn>
              <mi>x</mi>
              <mo>+</mo>
              <mi>y</mi>
            </mrow>
          </mtd>
          <mtd>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mo>=</mo>
            </mrow>
          </mtd>
          <mtd>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mn>8</mn>
            </mrow>
          </mtd>
        </mtr>
        <mtr>
          <mtd>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mo>−<!-- − --></mo>
              <mi>x</mi>
              <mo>+</mo>
              <mn>2</mn>
              <mi>y</mi>
            </mrow>
          </mtd>
          <mtd>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mo>=</mo>
            </mrow>
          </mtd>
          <mtd>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mo>−<!-- − --></mo>
              <mn>9</mn>
            </mrow>
          </mtd>
        </mtr>
      </mtable>
      <mo fence="true" stretchy="true" symmetric="true"></mo>
    </mrow>
  </mrow>
  <mspace width="1em"></mspace>
  <mspace width="1em"></mspace>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mtable columnalign="left" rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em">
      <mtr>
        <mtd>
          <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mtext>A: </mtext>
            <mo stretchy="false">(</mo>
            <mo>−<!-- − --></mo>
            <mn>5</mn>
            <mo>,</mo>
            <mo>−<!-- − --></mo>
            <mn>7</mn>
            <mo stretchy="false">)</mo>
          </mrow>
        </mtd>
      </mtr>
      <mtr>
        <mtd>
          <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mtext>B: </mtext>
            <mo stretchy="false">(</mo>
            <mo>−<!-- − --></mo>
            <mn>5</mn>
            <mo>,</mo>
            <mn>7</mn>
            <mo stretchy="false">)</mo>
          </mrow>
        </mtd>
      </mtr>
    </mtable>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">{\left\{ \begin{array}{*{20}{rcl}} { - 3x + y}&{ = }&{8} \\  { - x + 2y}&{ = }&{ - 9} \end{array}\right.}\quad\quad{\begin{array}{*{20}{l}}{\text{A: }( - 5, - 7)}\\ {\text{B: }( - 5,7)}  \end{array}}</annotation></semantics></math>

params.taskDescription:
<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mrow>
      <mo>{</mo>
      <mtable columnalign="right center left" rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em">
        <mtr>
          <mtd>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mi>x</mi>
              <mo>+</mo>
              <mi>y</mi>
            </mrow>
          </mtd>
          <mtd>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mo>=</mo>
            </mrow>
          </mtd>
          <mtd>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mn>2</mn>
            </mrow>
          </mtd>
        </mtr>
        <mtr>
          <mtd>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mi>y</mi>
            </mrow>
          </mtd>
          <mtd>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mo>=</mo>
            </mrow>
          </mtd>
          <mtd>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mfrac>
                <mn>3</mn>
                <mn>4</mn>
              </mfrac>
              <mi>x</mi>
            </mrow>
          </mtd>
        </mtr>
      </mtable>
      <mo fence="true" stretchy="true" symmetric="true"></mo>
    </mrow>
  </mrow>
  <mspace width="1em"></mspace>
  <mspace width="1em"></mspace>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mtable columnalign="left" rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em">
      <mtr>
        <mtd>
          <mtext>A: </mtext>
          <mrow>
            <mo>(</mo>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mfrac>
                <mn>8</mn>
                <mn>7</mn>
              </mfrac>
              <mo>,</mo>
              <mfrac>
                <mn>6</mn>
                <mn>7</mn>
              </mfrac>
            </mrow>
            <mo>)</mo>
          </mrow>
        </mtd>
      </mtr>
      <mtr>
        <mtd>
          <mtext>B: </mtext>
          <mrow>
            <mo>(</mo>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mn>1</mn>
              <mo>,</mo>
              <mfrac>
                <mn>3</mn>
                <mn>4</mn>
              </mfrac>
            </mrow>
            <mo>)</mo>
          </mrow>
        </mtd>
      </mtr>
    </mtable>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">{\left\{ \begin{array}{*{20}{rcl}}{x + y}&{ = }&{2}\\{y}&{ = }&{\frac{3}{4}x}\end{array}\right.}\quad\quad{\begin{array}{*{20}{l}}\text{A: }\left( {\frac{8}{7},\frac{6}{7}} \right)\\ \text{B: }\left( {1,\frac{3}{4}} \right)\end{array}}</annotation></semantics></math>

params.taskDescription:
<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mrow>
      <mo>{</mo>
      <mtable columnalign="right center left" rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em">
        <mtr>
          <mtd>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mn>2</mn>
              <mi>x</mi>
              <mo>+</mo>
              <mn>3</mn>
              <mi>y</mi>
            </mrow>
          </mtd>
          <mtd>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mo>=</mo>
            </mrow>
          </mtd>
          <mtd>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mn>6</mn>
            </mrow>
          </mtd>
        </mtr>
        <mtr>
          <mtd>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mi>y</mi>
            </mrow>
          </mtd>
          <mtd>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mo>=</mo>
            </mrow>
          </mtd>
          <mtd>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mfrac>
                <mn>2</mn>
                <mn>3</mn>
              </mfrac>
              <mi>x</mi>
              <mo>+</mo>
              <mn>2</mn>
            </mrow>
          </mtd>
        </mtr>
      </mtable>
      <mo fence="true" stretchy="true" symmetric="true"></mo>
    </mrow>
  </mrow>
  <mspace width="1em"></mspace>
  <mspace width="1em"></mspace>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mtable columnalign="left" rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em">
      <mtr>
        <mtd>
          <mtext>A: </mtext>
          <mo stretchy="false">(</mo>
          <mo>−<!-- − --></mo>
          <mn>6</mn>
          <mo>,</mo>
          <mn>2</mn>
          <mo stretchy="false">)</mo>
        </mtd>
      </mtr>
      <mtr>
        <mtd>
          <mtext>B: </mtext>
          <mo stretchy="false">(</mo>
          <mo>−<!-- − --></mo>
          <mn>3</mn>
          <mo>,</mo>
          <mn>4</mn>
          <mo stretchy="false">)</mo>
        </mtd>
      </mtr>
    </mtable>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">{\left\{ \begin{array}{*{20}{rcl}}{2x + 3y}&{ = }&{6} \\ {y}&{ = }&{\frac{2}{3}x + 2}\end{array}\right.}\quad\quad{\begin{array}{*{20}{l}}\text{A: }( - 6,2)\\ \text{B: }( - 3,4)\end{array}}</annotation></semantics></math>

questionSetStimulus: For the following exercises, determine if the points are solutions to the given system of equations.
